channel.description: Recent content in Merchandise returns on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Activate Merchandise returns
item.description: Steps Activate merchandise return On FO, it’s now possible to make a return New refund options are displayed on View order page in BO (Cancel product before payment, Standard refund after payment and before shipping, and Return Products after Shipment

item.title: Update options
item.description: Steps 1/ Have two orders, one made today, one 2 days ago (both Shipped) 2/ Change Time limit of validity to 1 day 3/ Check you can return product of the order made today, not on the once made 2 days ago 4/ Change the Return Prefix, make sure it’s modified in BO and FO

item.title: Manage merchandise returns
item.description: Steps Change status of merchandise returns, check it’s OK in FO, and that the return form is generated when necessary
